name: ROOT
description: ROOT is a cyber espionage themed hardcore stealth FPS that lets you play it how you want: whether creeping along corridors undetected or bursting into rooms to blow away all adversaries. Cyber terrorism is a dangerous profession, and risks have real consequences.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.1 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 512MB or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX9.0c Compatible Audio

reviews.review_text: Gotta say solid game. Love that I can be as aggressive as I like, but also like that I can hide when the action gets too real and I start crying. 10 out of 10. Would take to the moon if I was going there.
You get a dedicated 'woew' button and kicks which are twice as powerful as gunshots 10/10
I've only played the game twice and totaly regret buying the damn thing.
Completely worth it. Humorous, fun, challenging, stylish. What more could you want.
